education.label: Eduvos | Jan 2021 - Jul 2024
education.content: I pursued my Bachelor of Science degree in Software Engineering at Eduvos, where I gained a strong foundation in computer science principles, programming, and software development methodologies. My coursework covered a variety of topics, including object-oriented programming, web development, databases, cloud computing, and cybersecurity. Throughout my studies, I worked on multiple projects, both individually and in teams, applying theoretical concepts to real-world scenarios. I also developed proficiency in languages such as C#, JavaScript, and SQL. My time at Eduvos helped me develop critical problem-solving skills, adaptability, and a passion for continuous learning in the ever-evolving tech industry.

education.label: Bellville HighSchool | 2014 - 2019
education.content: I completed my high school education at Bellville High School, where I built a solid academic foundation and developed essential soft skills such as teamwork, communication, and leadership. I was actively involved in various school activities and took an interest in subjects related to technology and mathematics. My time in high school sparked my curiosity for software development and problem-solving, which eventually led me to pursue a career in software engineering.

experience.label: 1Nebula | Jan 2025 - Present
experience.content: As a Software Development Intern at 1Nebula, I am gaining hands-on experience in designing, developing, and testing software solutions. I work closely with senior developers, contributing to various projects that involve full-stack development. My role includes writing clean, efficient, and maintainable code using C# for backend development and React for frontend interfaces. I am also learning about cloud computing, API development, and Agile methodologies. This internship is providing me with valuable industry exposure and enhancing my technical and problem-solving skills.

experience.label: Ocean Basket | Nov 2022 - Jan 2025
experience.content: In my role as a Waiter at Ocean Basket Holdings, I provided excellent customer service by ensuring guests had a pleasant dining experience. My responsibilities included taking and delivering orders efficiently, handling customer inquiries, and managing payments. This role helped me develop strong communication, time management, and multitasking skills while working in a fast-paced environment. I also gained experience in teamwork and conflict resolution, which are valuable skills applicable to any professional setting.

experience.label: RocoMamas | Dec 2021 - Oct 2022
experience.content: As a Waiter at RocoMamas, I was responsible for providing friendly and attentive service to customers, taking orders accurately, and ensuring timely food delivery. Working in a high-energy environment helped me improve my ability to work under pressure, adapt to customer needs, and collaborate with team members to enhance the overall dining experience. This job strengthened my interpersonal skills and taught me the importance of customer satisfaction and service excellence.
